Posts.Content: do you ladies have any tips while on tamoxifen to hold off the weight gain - I already weight too much since going through the chemo and can't seem to get rid of it. thanks.
Posts.Title: am I destined to be fat while on tamoxifen?

Posts.Content: Is there anyone else out there who had a choice of a lumpectomy or mastectomy and chose bi-later mastectomy? I am having the bi-later end of the month and feel I made the right decision but of course still having some doubts and crying a lot? Already had 2 lumpectomy's without clear margins.
Posts.Title: Bi-lateral mastectomy

Posts.Content: you can still have your blood drawn and pressure taken on the non cancer side even though you have had a double mast. the only reason you can't have blood drawn on the cancer side is if you've had lymph nodes removed. This is to prevent lymphedema. Best wishes to you.
Posts.Title: ? on bilaterial mastectomy

Posts.Content: I have had all my blood pressure and all my blood draws on the non-cancer side even though I had both breasts off. Never a problem.
Posts.Title: ? on bilaterial mastectomy
